Posts.Content: As apposed to standard internal radiation? Is it as effective as standard internal radiation?
Posts.Title: Does anyone know about SAVI Breasy Bachytherapy radiation treatment?

Posts.Content: They put it in on Wednesday. Thurs. and Fri were her first two days (2x a day). Went ok. Mon, Tues, Wed. to go (2x a day).
Posts.Title: Does anyone know about SAVI Breasy Bachytherapy radiation treatment?

Posts.Content: she had the lumpectomy on june 19, doing ok, i am with her. we live about 20 miles from the hospital where the radiation is being given. We are staying in a hotel near the hospital instead of driving. The treatments make her tired.
Posts.Title: Does anyone know about SAVI Breasy Bachytherapy radiation treatment?

Posts.Content: My mother is San Diego. Thanks for the happy thoughts.
Posts.Title: Does anyone know about SAVI Breasy Bachytherapy radiation treatment?

Posts.Content: Its for my mother. From my research, there is less side effects. The doctor did make it clear though that we are rolling the dice somewhat because it is not as proven as full bresast radiation. First treatment tomorrow. Any tips to pass along to my mother?
Posts.Title: Does anyone know about SAVI Breasy Bachytherapy radiation treatment?

Posts.Content: Thanks for the info. Some websites say that chemo is needed, some say it is not. We did not consider a second opinion. It might not be a bad idea.
Posts.Title: How serious is DCIS (Ductal Carcinoma In Situ)?

Posts.Content: My mother is 75 years old and had breast cancer 30 years ago. She needed a mastectomy. She was just diagnosed with DCIS. The doctor is recommending a lumpectomy with chemo. I have done all the research online. I wanted to find out what people's experiences have been DCIS. How nervous should I be?
Posts.Title: How serious is DCIS (Ductal Carcinoma In Situ)?
